item.title: kvm virtual machine with vnc support
item.description: Install a KVM virtual machin with VNC support Create a disk for VM qemu-img create -f qcow2 <img path> <size> Use virt-install install a VM bash virt-install \ --virt-type kvm \ --name <name> \ --cdrom=<cdrom iso> \ --disk path=<disk path> \ --network network=default \ --graphics vnc,listen=0.0.0.0 \ --noautoconsole \ --os-type=<os type> \ --os-variant=<os> Show VNC port virsh vncdisplay <domain name> VM Operations Sometimes you need add For example:
